sentences.sContent: The noise of the aeroplane deafened us.
sentences.sContent_eng: The noise of the aeroplane deafened us.
sentences.sCn: 飞机的噪声使我们耳朵听不见了。

sentences.sContent: An aeroplane offers you an unusual and breathtaking view of the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: An aeroplane offers you an unusual and breathtaking view of the world.
sentences.sCn: 一架飞机提供了你一个不寻常的和惊人的世界观。

sentences.sContent: With your own aeroplane you fly where and when you want to , often to and from airfields that are not served by airlines .
sentences.sContent_eng: With your own aeroplane you fly where and when you want to , often to and from airfields that are not served by airlines .
sentences.sCn: 用自己的飞机，你可以随时去你想去的地方，起降的机场通常也不对航空公司开放。

remMethod.val: aero(空气) + plane(飞机) → 飞机

trans.tranOther: a flying vehicle with wings and at least one engine
